name: Truncate number to range min..max
description:
If the source number is X, this function returns
value < min ? min : value > max ? max : value
In other words, truncates the number to the range min..max, if it is a correct range (min≤max).

out_ports.name: changed
out_ports.hint: "true" string if the result number differs from the source, "false" if not
